name: Cook Finance
highlight: Defi index and structured strategy execution platform
summary: Cook Finance is a non custodial protocol that provides an on-chain composable index creation, portfolio management and structured strategy execution platform. It operates in both persmissionedless and permissioned environments according to the participantsâ€™ needs. Through holding of index tokens the participants can access to DeFi index yield in an efficient manner, and token holders maintain the ability to fully redeem investment.
